SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT MAX (AUFTNR) FROM POSITIONEN WHERE Ebene1 = :1 AND Ebene2 = :2 AND Ebene3 = :3 AND Ebene4 = :4 AND AUFTNR < :5 AND Artikel_Nr = ':6' AND IDNR=:7 AND (Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3 IS NULL OR Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3<=1)

SELECT MIN (AUFTNR) AS AUFTR_SQL FROM POSITIONEN WHERE Ebene1 = :1 AND Ebene2 = :2 AND Ebene3 = :3 AND Ebene4 = :4 AND Artikel_Nr = ':5' AND IDNR=:6 AND (Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3 IS NULL OR Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3<=1)

SELECT MAX (AUFTNR) FROM POSITIONEN WHERE Ebene1 = :1 AND Ebene2 = :2 AND Ebene3 = :3 AND Ebene4 = :4 AND AUFTNR > 1 AND AUFTNR < :5 AND Lief_ARTNR = ':6' AND IDNR=:7 AND (Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3 IS NULL OR Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3<=1)

SELECT MAX (AUFTNR) FROM POSITIONEN WHERE Ebene1 = :1 AND Ebene2 = :2 AND Ebene3 = :3 AND Ebene4 = :4 AND AUFTNR > 1 AND AUFTNR < :5 AND Lief_ARTNR IS NULL AND IDNR=:6 AND (Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3 IS NULL OR Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3<=1)
SELECT MIN (AUFTNR) FROM POSITIONEN WHERE Ebene1 = :1 AND Ebene2 = :2 AND Ebene3 = :3 AND Ebene4 = :4 AND Lief_ARTNR = ':5' AND IDNR=:6 AND (Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3 IS NULL OR Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3<=1)
SELECT MIN (AUFTNR) FROM POSITIONEN WHERE Ebene1 = :1 AND Ebene2 = :2 AND Ebene3 = :3 AND Ebene4 = :4 AND Lief_ARTNR IS NULL AND IDNR=:5 AND (Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3 IS NULL OR Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3<=1)

SELECT SUM(Liefermenge) as summe_liefermengen FROM POSITIONEN WHERE Ebene1 = :1 AND Ebene2 = :2 AND Ebene3 = :3 AND Ebene4 = :4 AND Artikel_Nr = ':5' AND IDNR=:6 AND (Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3 IS NULL or Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3<=1)
